resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow BeaconXPro use the Storage and location permission
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow BeaconXPro use the bluetooth and location permission
BeaconXPro requires access to Storage and location permission. If the permissions are not on, BeaconXPro cannot be used normally.
After that, BeaconXPro could search and connect with the device
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow BeaconXPro use the Location permission
BeaconXPro requires access to Location permission. If the permissions are not on, BeaconXPro cannot be used normally.
BeaconXPro requires access to bluetooth scan contract and location permission. If the permissions are not on, BeaconXPro cannot be used normally.
Are you sure you want to quit?
